summary: Follows five autistic children as they work together to create and perform a live musical production.
cast: Hillary Aaron|Joe Aaron|Lexi Aaron|Adam|Jordan Andrews|Conroe Brooks|Elaine Hall|Rosanne Katon|Lexi|Neal|Henry Stills|Kristen Stills|Stephen Stills|Wyatt|Simon Hamlin|Olanna Taskey
title: Autism: The Musical
